attributes.action: Scrap new "pay per mile" car tax proposals
attributes.additional_details: The potential costs motorists would have to pay for driving long distances would be exorbitant. A lot of people have suffered financially due to the covid crisis and many were already struggling before the covid crisis began. This proposal will put many motorists off the road and it just isn't right!
attributes.background: I want the government to scrap the "pay per mile" tax proposal which could stop families living long distance from seeing each other as often and put people out of work.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560867
